bodyText:
Click the + button to add edges to the graph

Start by adding a single edge. The vertices will be added for you automatically!
The names of the endpoints can include spaces, special characters and emojis
You will see the edges appear in a list as you add them
Tap the bottom of your screen to view the graph visually, or as a table
Tap and hold the edges to see advanced actions
Create and load multiple graphs in Settings
accessibilityLabel: Tutorial label for loading and saving graphs
